title: How long before my account is verified?

content:
It can take up to one business day (24 hours) to validate a new instructor. You will receive an email notification when your account has been verified. If you don't receive an email after one business day, contact your Sales Rep to check the status of your request.

Revel courses only: You can create a course before your instructor status is verified. To begin, use Search for Materials to search for course materials and create your courses. After your instructor account is verified and your email address is confirmed, you'll have access to the courses you've created.
